thread.title: Brilliant
thread.title_full: Brilliant - Review of Hotel Felicien by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: paigek453
title: Brilliant
text:
Lovely staff. Lovely rooms. Spa was brilliant. And was in a fantastic location! We loved Paris and can not wait to return! I would definitely recommend Hotel Felicien to everybody as we had the best stay !
Room Tip: Would love a response regarding the loss of our pictures which we left in room 401. So upset at the... See more room tips
